Actions.Name: Diablo
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage for each foe in end spaces of the cross. If three or more foes are effected, becomes a critical hit (+[D]).

Actions.Name: Cheat Reality
Actions.Description: The Maze Demon fixes it's Law of the Maze numbers to 13 (d20) and 6 (d10) for the rest of the round.

Actions.Name: Great Warp
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 takes [fray] piercing damage and is teleported 2.

Actions.Name: Fold Space
Actions.Description: The Maze Demon teleports all adjacent characters 1, then teleports 4.
